article.title: Raytheon to Modernize Patriot Missile Cryptography
article.text: Raytheon, Andover, Massachusetts, was awarded an $18,129,512 modification (PZ0001) to contract W31P4Q-15-C-0153 for 206 cryptographic modernization kits for Patriot missile systems. Work will be performed in Andover, Massachusetts (74 percent); Nashua, New Hampshire (21 percent); and Burlington, Massachusetts (5 percent), with an estimated completion date of October 31, 2018. Fiscal 2016 operations and maintenance, Army funds in the amount of $18,129,512 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
